text: The RPG Maker is a video game software which can be used to develop role- playing video games easily even for people that are not experienced in game design and coding. Until 2003, the program has been created by the Japanese company ASCII. From then on Enterbrain continued the development. The RPG Maker has a Graphical User Interface (GUI) which makes operating very simple. The software contains many options to customize a game. Within every version is a Run Time Package (RTP), contains many different graphics and sounds, although self-created files can be imported into the program as long as they are in the correct format such as size and type of file. [The website is http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/] == Versions == === RPG Maker 2000 === * Released on April 2000 in Europe for Microsoft Windows. * The game resolution is 320x240 (Based on the idea that the games should look like Super Nintendo games). * Unofficially translated by Don Miguel. * Many unofficially patches developed by the communities to make the software better. * Most used version in the Community. === RPG Maker 2003 === * Released in December 2003 in Japan for Microsoft Windows. * The use of third person-sideview battle system similar to Final Fantasy (Within fights characters and monsters are displayed from the side). * The maximum limit of displayed pictures at the same time has been set from 20 to 50. === RPG Maker XP === * Released on July 2004 in English for Microsoft Windows. * First version which has been fully translated into English by the company itself. * Resolution of 1240x440. * Complex Programming has been realized with the language Ruby. === RPG Maker VX === * Release Dates: Japan December 2007, Worldwide February 2008 * Simple Battle System * Supports Ruby === RPG Maker MV === * Released: October 2015 * Supports Android Export * Supports Java Script == Notable games == * Yume Nikki * Lisa: the Painful Category:Software
